metadata.title: CVE-2017-0630 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the kernel trace subsystem couldenable a local malicious application to access data outside of itspermission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it firstrequires compromising a privileged process. Product: Android. Versions:Kernel-3.10, Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-34277115.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
